hs_mmpower-2.remarks: Choose 2 categories from local Dining (excluding fast food), Electronics, or Entertainment for rebate.

hsbc_red-2.remarks: For eligible spending in Red Hot Rewards categories, including local dining and overseas spending.

hsbc_red-3.remarks: For eligible spending in Red Hot Rewards categories, including local dining and overseas spending.

hsbc_red-5.remarks: Only first $10,000 ebanking payment eligible for monthly rebate.

citi_cash_back-0.remarks: For local dining, local hotel, or overseas spending.

citi_cash_back-1.remarks: For local dining, local hotel, or overseas (UK and EEA excluded) spending.

dbs_eminent_vs-0.remarks: Spend over $300 on dining, sportswear, fitness clubs or medical services.

dbs_eminent_vs-1.remarks: For digital wallet spending, only first $5,000 eligible for monthly rebate.

dbs_eminent_vs-2.remarks: For digital wallet spending, only first $5,000 eligible for monthly rebate.
